head.supplied: Melbourne Botan. Garden ¶ YEAR 1868 ¶ Ferd von Mueller ¶ Gov Botanist & Director ¶ of the Bot Garden...

div.p: 69/R8734, unit 486, VPRS 1207/P000 inward registered correspondence, VA 865 Department of the Treasurer, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: See E. Symonds to M, 15 November 1869 (in this edition as 69-11-15c). The item is dated to 15 November on the assumption that M would have completed the form and returned it immediately upon receiving it from Symonds; and on the basis of the date recorded in the annotations. Melbourne Botan. Garden
